name: ADOPTED
description:
Adopted is a short horror game created for Beregon's Themed Horror Jam # 11. Please be aware that this game contains disturbing and or violent content, discretion is advised.

Note: This game definitely has bugs and weird flaws due to time constraints (I think I bit off more than I could chew..) but I worked hard on it and it is playtested, you can definitely get to the ending if you do things right. I may update in the future with a more refined version, thank you for playing!!!
